entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of wet flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of wet flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of wet flurries in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
